law.catch_line: The books and records of the Trust are subject to audit:...

text.section:
The books and records of the Trust are subject to audit:
by the State, at the State's discretion; and
annually by an independent auditor approved and paid by the Trust.

section.section: Within the first 90 days of each fiscal year, the Board shall report to the Governor and, subject to § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, to the General Assembly.
The report shall include a complete operating and financial statement of the operations of the Trust and a summary of the activities of the Trust during the preceding fiscal year.
